attributes.action: Help third world countries beat coronavirus utilising the Oxford vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: The Oxford vaccine is cheap, and requires no special storage facilities etc. so is useful in countries where that might be a problem. If effective, then despite the present economic problems Covid has wrought, we should realise that it is hitting other people even harder. They need our help - and common humanity demands that we offer that help.
attributes.background: If the Oxford vaccine is effective and viable, then allocate funds to help in vaccinating those in poorer countries which need help.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase funding to make Covid-19 vaccines available to developing countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550900
